thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 3 of 70
thread.title: Tom
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Tom

author: Tom
title: Tom
text: Referred by a friend, needed biz class LAX to Beirut. Saved us $1000 per ticket off retail and $1800 per ticket off what we had found that fit our schedule. Don't know how they did it, but they got us ONE STOP tickets at these prices, on the exact departures arrivals that we wanted. I know it doesn't work that way every time, but these guys will get my business from now on. The process was seamless. Howard Wang is a friendly, efficient professional.
